body.transcript:
Hello, thank you for calling Reliable Electrician Services. My name is Juan Bryant. How can I assist you today?

Hi, I'm really frustrated about a billing issue! My name is Kathleen Nelson. I'm being overcharged!

I'm sorry to hear that, Kathleen. Let me help resolve this for you. Could you please provide your invoice number so I can locate your account details?

Yes, it's three four five six.

Thank you. I see the invoice. To verify, could you also confirm the last four digits of your phone number associated with this account?

It's seven eight nine zero.

Perfect, thanks for verifying that. It looks like there was an error in the billing. I'll correct this right away and send you an updated invoice.

I hope this gets fixed quickly. I've been trying to sort this out for a while.

I apologize for the inconvenience, Kathleen. I've processed the correction, and you should receive the updated bill shortly. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

No, just make sure this is right this time, please.

Absolutely. Thank you for your patience and for reaching out to us. Have a great day, Kathleen.
